title: User Forgot Password for Streaming Account
description: A user cannot log in to their streaming account because they have forgotten their password.

tasks.description: Identify the user by their email address.
Trigger a secure password reset link to be sent to the user's registered email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the reset email.

tasks.description: Instruct the user to check their email and follow the instructions to set a new password.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear guidance to the user.
